title: Broken Lords
description: Answering the High Lord's summons, the leaders of the Union meet at his Court. Thane, Dread Lord of Eladria, is among them and eager to see justice done to his former friend-turned-adversary, Malachi, but their meeting raises more questions than answers. An unexpected catastrophe shakes his trust to its very core and he is forced to question all he once held true. Thane knows what a broken Mirror is capable of, but what about a broken Lord?
author: A.F. Dery
